results.name: a(n) = 6^n - 2^n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (8,-12).
formula: E.g.f.: exp(6*x) - exp(2*x) = 2*exp(4*x)*sinh(2*x). - _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 09 2021
program: (Sage) [2^n*(3^n -1) for n in (0..25)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 09 2021
results.author: _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 04 2014
